export const HeroCarousel = (props) => { return (
{props.data ? props.data.data.heroCarousel.map((d, i) => (

{d.title}

{d.text}

{props.data.data.buttonHero === "" ? "" : {props.data ? props.data.data.buttonHero : ''}}
)) : 'Loading...'}
) }
